      • DOI: 10.1145/3430846
      • URL
    5. Guindy, M., Barsi, A., Kara, P.A., Balogh, T., and Simon, A. 2021. Interaction methods for light field displays by means of a theater model environment. Holography: Advances and Modern Trends VII, SPIE, 109–118.
      • DOI: 10.1117/12.2589126
      • URL

      • DOI: 10.1117/12.2589129

    11. Tausch, R., Domajnko, M., Ritz, M., Knuth, M., Santos, P., and Fellner, D.W. 2020. Towards 3D Digitization in the GLAM (Galleries, Libraries, Archives, and Museums) Sector: Lessons Learned and Future Outlook. IPSI Transactions on Internet Research 16, 1, 45–53.
      • URL
    12. Pintore, G., Agus, M., and Gobbetti, E. 2020. AtlantaNet: Inferring the 3D Indoor Layout from a Single 360 degree Image Beyond the Manhattan World Assumption. Computer Vision – ECCV 2020, Springer International Publishing, 432–448.
      • DOI: 10.1007/978-3-030-58598-3_26
      • URL
    13. Filoscia, I., Alderighi, T., Giorgi, D., Malomo, L., Callieri, M., and Cignoni, P. 2020. Optimizing Object Decomposition to Reduce Visual Artifacts in 3D Printing. Computer Graphics Forum 39, 2, 423–434.
